original_text: but if the animals were weak, he would not place them there. So the weak animals went to Laban and the strong ones to Jacob.
korean_text: 약한 양이면 그 가지를 두지 아니하니 그렇게 함으로 약한 것은 라반의 것이 되고 튼튼한 것은 야곱의 것이 된지라

sentences.original_text: but if the animals were weak
he would not place them there
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들을 그곳에 두지 않았을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: So the weak animals went to Laban
and the strong ones to Jacob
